input.sentences: the local children 's orchestra performed at the park today .
the weather was great | and we were thankful for it since our seats were out in the open .
the children did very well playing their songs !
afterwards | we went to a cafe and ate outside on the patio .
we enjoyed our outing very much !
output.sentences: It was a beautiful, summer afternoon  in the park and the high school orchestra was playing.
There were seats around the gazeebo, although some people brought their own chairs.
The kids had obviously practiced hard and gave a very good performance.
Afterwards, we took Grandpa out to eat at his favorite cafe.
We sat outside in the sunshine and commemorated the day with a photo.
